testcase.name: test_payload_generator_creation

testcase.name: test_articulated_payload_model
testcase.failure: tests\unit\services\snipers\tools\prompt_articulation\test_components.py:314: in test_articulated_payload_model assert payload.reasoning == "Test reasoning" ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ArticulatedPayload = <class 'services.snipers.utils.prompt_articulation.components.payload_generator.ArticulatedPayload'> payload = ArticulatedPayload(content='Test payload content', framing_type=<FramingType.QA_TESTING: 'qa_testing'>, format_control=<FormatControlType.RAW_OUTPUT: 'raw_output'>, context_summary={}) self = <prompt_articulation.test_components.TestPayloadGenerator object at 0x000002AA64F79090> ..\..\AppData\Local\Programs\Python\Python313\Lib\site-packages\pydantic\main.py:1026: in __getattr__ raise AttributeError(f'{type(self).__name__!r} object has no attribute {item!r}') E AttributeError: 'ArticulatedPayload' object has no attribute 'reasoning' __class__ = <class 'pydantic.main.BaseModel'> item = 'reasoning' private_attributes = {} pydantic_extra = None self = ArticulatedPayload(content='Test payload content', framing_type=<FramingType.QA_TESTING: 'qa_testing'>, format_control=<FormatControlType.RAW_OUTPUT: 'raw_output'>, context_summary={})
